name: Jet Set Boom
description:
A Worms-type game for up to 4 players.

CONTROLS:

* A/D - Walk Left/Right

* W/S - Aim up/down

*Space - Jump

*LMB - Select weapon icons

*RMB - Shoot!  (Hold for power with certain weapons)

GAMEPLAY  (If you haven't played a Worms game before)

* Each player controls multiple Willys, and the aim is to have the last surviving Willy.

* It's a hot seat game, so when you've finished your turn, left the next player sit in front of the computer.

* When it's your turn, select a weapon or piece of equipment, and use it with the aim of destroying enemy Willys.

* You only get a short time to take your turn, so be quick!

* All the weapons work in different ways, so have fun working out how to use them best.
